title: JavaScript Analysis Lab
description: The intent of this lab is to practice JavaScript analysis and automation of client-side functionality. The client-side code in this scenario modifies input data before sending it to the server. There are two tasks to complete. First, identify a quick way to inject arbitrary data into the field. Next identify an approach that will allow you to use Burp's scanner against the input pre-encoded, ensuring scan payloads are ultimately encoded properly and parsed by the server.

goals.description: Bypass client-side validation to inject manual payloads
goals.hint: Look for quick wins in the client-side JS.

goals.description: Identify an approach to allow Burp's scanner to inject payloads that are properly encoded
goals.hint: First, identify tooling required to manipulate scan output.
